spec_data.Name: libwebcam
spec_data.Description:
Libwebcam provides a user-space library for interaction with the uvcvideo
kernel driver. One could use this library to manipulate settings for one
or many UVC-type webcams found attached on a single computer.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 31 Jul 2017 11:31:54 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A library for user-space configuration of the uvcvideo driver
